Ambush.description: Attacks from hiding for bonus damage or surprise.

Sticky.description: Slows or immobilizes targets on contact.

Slow.description: Reduced movement speed or attack frequency.

Latch.description: Can attach to objects or enemies, preventing escape.

Scavenge.description: Gains resources or heals from defeated enemies.

Blend In.description: Harder to detect; camouflages with environment.

Jump Attack.description: Can leap to attack distant targets.

Surprise.description: First attack in combat deals extra damage.

Swallow.description: Can consume and trap smaller enemies.

Intimidating.description: Reduces enemy morale or chance to attack.

Terrify.description: Causes fear, making enemies flee or act erratically.

Camouflage.description: Invisible or disguised until attacking. (Also: Blends in with environment.)

Reflect.description: Returns a portion of damage to attacker.

Illusion.description: Creates false images to confuse enemies.

Summon Mini-Mimics.description: Spawns smaller mimic allies during combat.

Sticky Floor.description: Slows all enemies in the room.

Spell Mimicry.description: Can copy and use a spell seen in battle.

Consume Magic.description: Absorbs magical effects for healing or power.

Fake Casting.description: Pretends to cast spells to bait reactions.

True Mimicry.description: Can perfectly imitate large objects or rooms.

Devour.description: Deals massive damage and heals self on kill.

Reflect Damage.description: Returns all or most damage to attacker.

Terrifying Presence.description: Reduces effectiveness of all enemies in room.

Flammable.description: Takes extra damage from fire, but can ignite enemies.

Illuminating.description: Emits light, revealing hidden objects or enemies.

Spell Trap.description: Triggers magical effects when tampered with.

Paper Thin.description: Very low defense, but hard to hit.

Grip.description: Can hold objects or enemies in place.

Shadow Form.description: Can pass through shadows or become intangible.

Teleport Short.description: Can blink within the same room.

Fear Pulse.description: Emits a wave of fear, disrupting enemies.

Haunt Room.description: Room effects persist after monster is gone.

Store Spells.description: Can hold and later use absorbed spells.

Cast Copy.description: Casts a weaker version of a stored spell.

Illusory Room.description: Creates a fake room to trap or mislead.

Devour Spell.description: Destroys a spell and gains its power.

Split.description: Divides into smaller versions when damaged.

Absorb.description: Gains health or power from environment.

Unstable.description: May explode or change form when hit.

Crushing Weight.description: Deals extra damage to immobilized targets.

Poison Cloud.description: Emits a toxic cloud that damages over time.

Fragile Core.description: Weak spot that takes extra damage.

Mimic Voice.description: Can imitate voices to lure or confuse.

Amorphous Giant.description: Very large and hard to contain.

Reshape.description: Can change form to fit through spaces.

Spell Absorb.description: Heals or powers up from spells.

Multi-Grab.description: Can grab multiple targets at once.

Trap Placement.description: Can set traps in the room.

Quick Burst.description: Can act twice in quick succession.

Photosynthesis.description: Heals in sunlight or bright light.

Mass Entangle.description: Can immobilize all enemies in a room.

Rootquake.description: Shakes the ground, knocking enemies down.

Regen Spores.description: Heals self and allies over time.

Explode on Death.description: Deals damage to nearby enemies when killed.

Gas Cloud.description: Emits a cloud that obscures vision.

Spread Terrain.description: Changes the terrain to its advantage.

Absorb Nutrients.description: Heals from defeated enemies or plants.

Rot Field.description: Damages all living things in area.

Spore Rebirth.description: Can revive as a spore creature.

Side Step.description: Can dodge attacks from the side.

Speed Burst.description: Can move very quickly for a short time.

Earthquake Step.description: Shakes the ground with each step.

Unshakable.description: Cannot be knocked back or stunned.

Screech.description: Emits a loud noise to disorient enemies.

Vulture Grip.description: Can hold onto targets, preventing escape.

Shock Wave.description: Deals area damage with sound or force.

Roaring Tempest.description: Summons a storm to damage all enemies.

Predator Dive.description: Deals extra damage to isolated targets.

Fragile.description: Takes extra damage from all sources.

Echo Pulse.description: Emits a sound wave to locate enemies.

Stun Cry.description: Chance to stun all enemies in range.

Exploding Death.description: Deals damage to all nearby on death.

Soul Drain.description: Steals life and mana from enemies.

Life Steal.description: Heals for a portion of damage dealt.

Resilient.description: Takes less damage from all sources.

Mist Form.description: Can become mist to avoid attacks.

Bloodstorm.description: Summons a storm of blood, damaging all enemies.

Glare.description: Chance to petrify or stun enemies.

Coil Grip.description: Can immobilize enemies with its body.

Massive Coil.description: Can trap multiple enemies at once.

Bark.description: Can alert allies or frighten enemies.

Savage Bite.description: Deals extra damage on critical hits.

Mark Prey.description: Targets take extra damage from all sources.

Relentless.description: Does not stop attacking until defeated.

Resist Pain.description: Takes less damage from all sources.

Frail.description: Takes extra damage from all sources.

Plague Trail.description: Leaves a trail that spreads disease.

Immortal Core.description: Cannot be killed by normal means.

Soul Rot.description: Drains life and mana from enemies.
